sub_topic: Show that every group of order 16 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16.
message_1: Given a group G of order 16, show that it is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16 by determining the number of elements of order 2 in the group.
